sourceDesc:
<<<<<<< HEAD
The oath to be ministred by the Master and Warden of the Apotheca[ri]es unto every apprentice of the said Company Society of Apothecaries, London.
1 sheet
s.n., [London : 1670?]
Begins: "You shall swear to be good and true to our Sovereign Lord the Kings Majesty, .. ". Black letter. Publication place and date from Wing. Copy filmed creased and torn, affecting text. Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
=======
